parameters.name: AssociatedInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance that is assigned the IPv6 address.

parameters.name: AssociatedInstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the instance that is assigned the IPv6 address.

Set the value to **EcsInstance**, which specifies an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance in a virtual private cloud (VPC). This is the default value.

parameters.name: IncludeReservationData
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return information about pending orders. Valid values:

*   **false** (default)
*   **true**

parameters.name: Ipv6Address
parameters.description: The IPv6 address that you want to query.

parameters.name: Ipv6AddressId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPv6 address that you want to query. You can enter at most 20 IPv6 address IDs in each API request. Separate IPv6 address IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: Ipv6InternetBandwidthId
parameters.description: The ID of the Internet bandwidth that you purchased for the IPv6 address.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the IPv6 address that you want to query.

The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). The name must start with a letter but cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: NetworkType
parameters.description:
The type of communication supported by the IPv6 address. Valid values:

*   **Private**
*   **Public**

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which you want to query IPv6 addresses. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch to which the IPv6 address belongs.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC to which the IPv6 address belongs.
